text: Ne boolela Abasuubili abakhasi benamie tsimoni tsiabu, ne baliinde ebiekenyi biabu, ne balalolesia emibili chiabu halali bilia ebilolekhanga (obweni nende ebikalamo nende ebisisilo biebilenje) ne babusie ebitambaya biabu okhula khubilifu biabu, ne balalolesia oburone bwabu halali khuBasatsa babu, nohomba Basamwana, nohomba Samwana Abasatsa babu, nohomba Abana babu, nohomba Abana babasatsa babu, nohomba Abasiani babu, nohomba Abanabo musiani wabu, nohomba Abana bomukhana wabu, nohomba abakhasi bashiabwe, nohomba balia bemikhono chiabu emisatsa chiatila, nohomba Abasatsa abakhulundu ababula obwikombi nohomba Abana bashili okhumanya amakhuwa keshiekenyi shiabakhasi . Nebalatuya ebilenje biabu hasi mbu khobimanyikhane ebiabafisile muburone bwabu. Ne musabe eshileshelo mwesi khu Nyasaye enywe Abasuubili mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhubura
